messages.title: Why I'm backing Vicky Foxcroft
messages.content: The Windrush scandal broke at the time I was struggling to secure student finance for my studies. Vicky identified the root of my troubles and helped me secure my status, apply for citizenship and pay my student fees. Having such a committed, hardworking MP in today’s hostile environment is invaluable.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Urgent action to tackle climate change
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to a Green New Deal, creating hundreds of thousands of good, green jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investing in our schools and our NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pledge to increase investment in schools, hospitals, and the NHS for a fairer society.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A million new genuinely affordable houses
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour's commitment to address the housing crisis, deliver a million social and affordable homes, and target rogue landlords.

mentions.candidate: If re-elected, will continue to champion the local area, fight to remain in the EU and represent residents' best interests in Parliament.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Voting against bad Brexit deal proposed by the Tories, fight hard against a no deal Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Final say on Brexit, fight to remain in the EU.
issues.environment: Tackle climate change, Green New Deal.
issues.health: Invest in our NHS, prescription charges and a Green New Deal.

housing.content: Build one million new social and genuinely affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been proud to serve as your MP since 2015. For me, politics is local.

politicalExperience.achievements: Participating in campaigns that make a difference to the local community.

endorsements.endorsement: Vicky has been invaluable in helping resolve issues related to the Windrush scandal and securing my student finance.

quotes.text: I’ve voted against every bad Brexit deal proposed by the Tories, fought hard against a no deal Brexit and I’ll keep fighting for us to remain in the EU.

images.caption: Vicky Foxcroft in a group photo including Labour party members.
Vicky Foxcroft on the campaign trail.
